messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 57 newbies and how did you find us?
messages.msgSnippet: How did y all find UnschoolingBasics? Were you referred here from another list? A friend? A website? Surfing? Are you coming to unschooling from attachment
messages.messageBody:
"How did y'all find UnschoolingBasics? Were you referred here from
another
list? A friend? A website? Surfing?

Are you coming to unschooling from attachment parenting----like Robyn
and
Rue and Deb? Or are you coming into it from a schooling background,
like me
and
Pam and Ren?

Are you looking at unschooling as a means of "education" only? Or do
you
find it emcompassing your lives? Do you want to limit it to educational
things?
Or do you want it as a lifestyle?"

I was referred by another list, AlwaysLearning. Sandra put it out there and I came over and am so glad I did. I'm coming from AP. Well, I guess I thought it was about education only...but now I know that life is the education and that it is a whole attitude that I am incorporating into every area of our lives. I have learned a lot here!
Millie




---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Mail - Helps protect you from nasty viruses.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
